title: New: Vessel – Raven Banner
content: So Vessel ended 2012 with 2 new cuts, that despite not setting the world alight, increased our excitement for what the Triangle Records producer may have in store for us in 2013. His new effort, the damaged, synth-laden piece, Raven Banner, certainly sustains our excitement. It’s a disorientating thing, blooming suddenly, and then dramatically pulling the atmospheric rug from under the feet. Yet it also manages to find a thick and scratched up groove that’s as perverse as it is infectious.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
